Installation
===============

* Open *Fiji*
* Select *Help > Update*
* Add the following update site `link <https://sites.imagej.net/Mananlalit/>`_ under *Manage Update Sites*
* Restart *Fiji*
* Search for *PlatyMatch*

(*Optional*: Installation from Source)

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/juglab/PlatyMatch.git
   git checkout tags/v1.0_tag -b v1.0
